viStories.title: Đói bụng (Hungry)
viStories.focusWords: tôi, ăn, không, đói. New words in context: cơm (rice), bạn (friend).

tlStories.title: Nagugutom (Hungry)
sentences: Binigyan ako ng kaibigan ko ng kanin.
tlStories.focusWords: ako, kumain, wala, gutom. New words in context: kanin (rice), kaibigan (friend).
